ROW.Name_Event: The Lateran Canons set up in the island while all the properties of San Clemente, including archival documents and relics, are transferred to Santa Maria della Carità
ROW.Synopsis: The relics of Sant'Aniano are brought to the church of Santa Maria della Carità and install on the main altar in 1453.

Source.Event: The Lateran Canons set up in the island while all the properties of San Clemente, including archival documents and relics, are transferred to Santa Maria della Carità
